name: SADDLE BAG WITH STRAP
description: Maria Grazia Chiuri brings a fresh update to the iconic Saddle bag. Crafted in warm taupe grained calfskin, the legendary design presents a Saddle flap with a D stirrup clasp on a magnetic strap with pulls, as well as an antique gold-finish metal CD signature on either side of the shoulder strap. Featuring a thin, adjustable and removable shoulder strap, the Saddle bag may be carried by hand, worn over the shoulder or crossbody.

name: MEDIUM LADY DIOR BAG
description: The Lady Dior bag captures the House's vision of elegance and beauty. Sleek and refined, the timeless style is crafted in calfskin printed with the white and gold-tone Butterfly Zodiac motif by Pietro Ruffo, showcasing a constellation enhanced by astrological signs and adorned with butterflies. Pale gold-finish metal D.I.O.R. charms enhance and illuminate its silhouette. Featuring a thin, removable leather strap, the medium Lady Dior bag can be carried by hand or worn crossbody.

name: Long Kensington Heritage Trench Coat
description: The iconic Burberry trench coat, made in England from shower-resistant cotton gabardine. Inside is Burberry Check cotton, used to line our coats since the 1920s. Part of the Heritage collection, the Kensington is cut to a regular fit with set-in sleeves.

name: Leather Shearling Jacket
description: Double-breasted jacket features a contrast shearling neckline with an adjustable strap, with a zipper closure. Crafted from leather and lamb shearling. Detailed with adjustable straps at the neck and hem. Cut to a relaxed fit and a hip length.

name: EMBROIDERED CREPE COUTURE SHORT DRESS
description: Short dress in embroidered Crepe Couture Rhinestone strap detail Crepe Couture (65% Virgin Wool, 35% Silk) Habotai lining (100% Silk) Length: 85 cm / 33.5 in. from the shoulders in an Italian size 40 The model is 176 cm / 5'9 tall and wears an Italian size 40 Made in Italy The look of the model is completed by a Valentino Garavani Locò Bag and Valentino Garavani Nite Out Shoes.

name: CREPE COUTURE SHORT DRESS
description: Crepe Couture short dress Contrasting rose appliqué detail on the shoulders Crepe Couture (65% Virgin Wool, 35% Silk) Georgette Stretch lining (91% Viscose, 9% Elastane) Length: 90 cm / 35.8 in. from the shoulders in an Italian size 40 Sleeve length: 37 cm / 14.5 in. from the center back in an Italian size 40 The model is 176 cm / 5'9 tall and wears an Italian

name: SMALL CARRY SECRETS EMBROIDERED BUCKET BAG
description: Valentino Garavani Carry Secrets small embroidered bucket bag. Metal handles with VLogo Signature element Satin lining. Interior: leather card slots Dimensions: W15xH12xD10 cm / W5.9xH4.7xD3.9 in. Made in Italy

name: VLOGO SIGNATURE PATENT LEATHER SLINGBACK PUMP 80MM / 3.15 IN.
description: Valentino Garavani patent leather slingback pump with VLogo Signature embellishment. VLogo Signature detail covered in patent leather using high-frequency welding Heel height 80mm/3.15 Made in Italy

name: CASHMERE CARDIGAN WITH HORSEBIT
description: Classic knitwear designs in sophisticated color schemes are enriched by refined details and emblematic House codes. Crafted from camel soft cashmere, this cardigan features the gold-toned metal Horsebit—a notable Gucci symbol borrowed from the equestrian world—paired with subtle leather details.

name: COTTON LAMÉ KNIT POLO SHIRT
description: Distinguished textures and vibrant palettes exude a warm feeling, as one season ends and another one begins. This textured cotton sweater reveals vintage GG enamelled buttons and is further enriched with a gold lamé trim.

name: WOOL JACKET WITH HORSEBIT
description: The season's sleek silhouette draws inspirations from the 1990s, with slim-fitting tops and slightly low-slung bottoms. The pared-down look has also been reinterpreted in a new palette with neutrals and pops of color. This clean-cut jacket is presented in camel wool and enriched with an Interlocking G and heart embroidery as well as a slim Horsebit detail.

name: WOMEN'S DOUBLE G RAIN BOOT
description: Perfect for a rainy day, this pair of heeled boots is crafted from water-resistant rubber in earthy tones, complemented by a tonal Double G and Gucci lettering across the heel.
